title: Skippyjon Jones
description: Holy guacamole! Meet t he #1  New York Times  bestselling Skippyjon Jones!Skippyjon Jones is no ordinary kitten. Oh, no. . . .He's actually El Skippito, a great sword-fighter ready to battle banditos the world over! With a little imagination and a whole lot of fun, this frisky cat dons a mask and cape and takes on a bad bumble-beeto to save the day. And along the way, he'll be sure to steal young reader's hearts, yes indeed-o!My name is Skippito Friskito.  I fear not a single bandito.  My manners are mellow,  I'm sweet like the Jell-O,  I get the job done, yes indeed-o.  * "Both feline hero and story are full of beans (more Mexican-jumping than pinto) but ay caramba, mucho fun."— Kirkus Reviews , starred review"Buoyant and colorful cartoon illustrations match the exuberant text perfectly."— School Library Journal
author: Judy Schachner
